body.name: UPPAbaby Vista V2 Stroller/Convertible Single-to-Double System/Bassinet, Toddler Seat, Bug Shield, Rain Shield, and Storage Bag Included/Gregory (Blue Mélange/Silver Frame/Saddle Leather)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 45 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 4 hrs 30 mins
features: THE ULTIMATE GROW UP: Our Vista stroller is intuitively designed to “grow” with your family! It starts as a single stroller but can easily transform to accommodate up to three children with added accessories and adapters — becoming the ultimate in portability and convenience!
INCLUDED TODDLER SEAT: The full size, reversible Toddler Seat allows your growing child to ride forwards, backwards, completely upright, reclined, and anywhere in between.

INCLUDED BASSINET: The included Bassinet is suitable from birth up to 20lbs. The Bassinet includes a perforated mattress pad and vented base which provides added breathability, creating a truly comfortable and safe resting space for your baby.

ONE-HANDED RECLINE: The multi-position recline on the Toddler Seat allows your child to lie comfortably for naps or sit upright to take in the sights, offering the flexibility your busy toddler needs.
EXTENDABLE, UPF 50+ CANOPY: The zip-out canopy on the Toddler Seat extends for additional sun protection, plush the mesh panels make it easy to peek in while adding airflow.
EXTRA-LARGE, EASY-ACCESS BASKET: The extra-large opening means it’s easier to reach your diaper bag, toys, and whatever else you pick up along the way, up to 30 lbs!

STROLL IN STYLE: Choose from a variety of luxurious fabrics and premium full-grain leather details like our adjustable, telescoping handlebar which extends for parents of varying heights. Our leather accents are all REACH certified for safer strolling.
PATENTED TWO-STAGE SYSTEM: The All-Wheel Suspension and independent shocks ensure your child has a smooth and comfortable ride whether traveling down winding paths or over bumpy pavement.
STANDS WHEN FOLDED: The Vista one-step fold is easy and intuitive. The stroller stands on its own when folded and can be folded with or without the Toddler Seat attached.
PERFORMANCE TRAVEL SYSTEM: Our UPPAbaby Mesa Infant Car Seats attach directly to the Vista stroller without adapters to create a complete Performance Travel System.
body.description: The VISTA is designed to grow with families offering multiple configuration options all while strolling like a single. The new VISTA V2 offers design improvements solidifying its positioning as a performance stroller system while functional upgrades make the lives of parents even easier. Expandable seat selections that allow for two forward and parent-facing, reclining seats; two MESA infant car seats, two bassinets and countless other combinations Performance Travel System compatible with MESA Infant Car Seat – direct attachment, no adapters necessary Full-size forward and parent-facing Toddler Seat Improved shock-absorbing front and rear suspension Adjustable canopy with a zip out UPF 50+ sunshade for more sun protection No rethread harness can be tightened or loosened in a singular motion User-friendly wheel lock with visual lock indicator One-handed, multi-position recline One-button telescoping handlebar One-hand release, pivoting bumper bar for easy loading 100% full-grain leather accents Fabrics are removable and washable Extra-large, easy-access basket with 30 lbs. weight limit Combines aluminum with magnesium for optimal lightweight, durable performance One-step fold, with or without Toddler Seat attached Stands independently when folded All-weather protection with included Toddler Seat Rain Shield and Bug Shield Bassinet: Zip-out, water-repellant inner liner and boot cover are easy to remove and clean Perforated mattress pad, vented base and canopy allow for added breathability Extendable, pop out UPF 50+ sunshade Depth and ventilation provide a safe overnight sleeping solution Included Bassinet Bug Shield and Storage Bag

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: SPOT CLEAN OR HAND WASH GENTLY IN COLD WATER WITH MILD DETERGENT. DO NOT BLEACH. DRY FLAT AND AWAY FROM DIRECT SUNLIGHT BEFORE RE-USE OR STORAGE. DO NOT IRON OR DRY CLEAN.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: One For All. The VISTA’s intuitive design allows for multiple configurations, making transporting a second and third child a breeze — all while strolling like a single. Included: Bassinet: From birth optionToddler Seat: Suitable from 3 months to 50 lbs

Extendable, zip out canopy The Toddler Seat Canopy includes zip out fabric that extends for additional sun protection, and mesh panels that make it easy to peek in while adding air flow. Full-size, reversible Toddler Seat Our included Toddler Seat is designed to meet the growing size and curiosity of your child, allowing them to ride forwards or parent-facing. Stands when folded The VISTA one-step fold is easy and intuitive. The stroller stands on its own when folded and can be folded with or without the Toddler Seat attached. Extra-large, easy-access basket The large opening means it’s easier to reach your diaper bag, toys, and whatever else you pick up along the way.

Included Bassinet Our Bassinet turns your VISTA into a baby buggy. With just one hand, you can detach the Bassinet and carry your sleeping infant anywhere. The Bassinet is also a perfect overnight sleep solution when paired with the Bassinet Stand accessory.

Expansion Options Performance Travel System The MESA Infant Car Seat attaches directly to the VISTA delivery a Performance Travel System that is the ultimate in portability and safety. No need to sacrifice performance for convenience. RumbleSeat Accessory Our RumbleSeat accessory can be used forward-facing, parent-facing and reclined - it's the multitasking second seat you have only dreamed of. RumbleSeat suitable from 3 months to 35 lbs or 36", whichever comes first PiggyBack Accessory The PiggyBack ride along board easily attaches to the back of your VISTA stroller to allow your toddler to join the stroll, even when they are too tired to walk on their own. Transport up to three children with the addition of the PiggyBack ride along board.

VISTA V2 CRUZ V2 RIDGE MINU V2 Age/Weight Range 3 months to 50 lbs 3 months to 50 lbs 3 months to 55 lbs 3 months to 50 lbs Maximum Number of Children 3 2 2 2 From Birth Options (Sold Separately) Bassinet (Included), Infant SnugSeat, MESA Infant Car Seat Bassinet, Infant SnugSeat, MESA Infant Car Seat Bassinet, MESA Infant Car Seat Bassinet, MESA Infant Car Seat Expansion (Sold Separately) RumbleSeat, PiggyBack, Bassinet/MESA (twin mode) PiggyBack PiggyBack PiggyBack True Weight (includes frame, canopy, basket, wheels) 27 lbs, Bassinet: 8.8 lbs 25.5 lbs 29.2 lbs 16.9 lbs Unfolded 36” L x 25.7” W x 39.5” H 37.5” L x 22.8” W x 40” H 38.5” L x 26” W x 40.5” H 35.5” L x 20.3” W x 41” H Folded 17.3" L x 25.7" W x 33.3" H 16.5" L x 22.8" W x 33" H 18.5" L x 26" W x 36.5" H 12” L x 20.3” W x 23” H Maximum Basket Capacity 30 lbs 30 lbs 20 lbs 20 lbs Reversible Seat ✓ ✓ Adjustable Handlebar ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and very versatile
reviews.reviewText: I spent a long time researching what I wanted for our second baby. With being a winter baby I really wanted a bassinet option and the ability to change out pieces as needed.Pros: I love this stroller so far! It is so easy to change out seats and drives like a dream. Additionally the bassinet is serving as our primary one now because our baby loves it so much! The quality in the bassinet alone is amazing—my son peed all over it and the pee didn’t even penetrate the cover!Only one con: my 4 year old is a tiny but tall for the toddler seat despite being 37 lbs but he still finds it super comfortable and is really anlmost out of stroller riding anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE our UppaBaby Stroller and Bassinet
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love our UppaBaby stroller and bassinet! I use it pretty much everyday on walks on trails or the street. It glides like butter, and others who push it compliment its ease. I have taken it through grass a few times and it’s really easy to push. It has shock-absorbing, all-wheel suspension which is one quality we were looking for when choosing a stroller. It was one of the qualities I asked people they wished they had in their stroller or looked for when they chose a stroller.The stroller is really easy to fold up and open back up. About two weeks post C-section it was easy enough for me to open, close, and lift into my car. I appreciate that the bassinet is one button to remove from the attachment pieces on the stroller.My little one loves laying in the bassinet while we go on walks. The material is breathable and machine washable. I haven’t washed it yet but it’s easy to remove. I appreciate that it comes with the bug net and an SPF 50 sunshade. It’s easy to pull down and push back up.I like that you can add an additional bassinet, toddler seat, or a skateboard on the back. We just have the one kiddo right now, but we plan to buy an attachment piece when we need it.Although it’s a little on the pricey side, it’s great quality and I feel like it’ll last us awhile. I would recommend it to anyone looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller
reviews.reviewText: The design of Uppababy Vista is fantastic. The stroller is sturdy and rides smoothly with wheel suspension. The handlebar is amazing: Extendable, sturdy, never gets stuck and it’s covered with waterproof leather. The stroller folds up easily with one click. The bottom basket is huge and holds up to 30 lbs. The bassinet is handy and we will be using the bassinet with the bassinet stand as baby's nighttime sleep spot for a while. We love how it will grow with our family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but worth it!
reviews.reviewText: We love our uppababy! It’s a sturdy good quality stroller and we love to have the option to use the bassinet or seat! It is really big so it barely fits in my trunk but it’s great quality and little man is super comfortable so it’s a win for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Stroller on the market!!!! ❤️
reviews.reviewText: This is hands-down, the best her stroller money can buy. It is so smooth of a drive you can rotate so the baby can sit up and lay back in multiple positions for different types of feeding or sleeping. The details on the embroidery and the leather are immaculate. This is the most beautiful stroller, not only the best, but the most beautiful too. Our daughter loves it as much as we do!!! We are expecting another so this stroller gives us the option to grow as a family as well! I personally wouldn’t by any other stroller on the market than this one! It’s is worth every dollar!!! BUY IT YOU WILL BE HAPPY! ✨😍🐇

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is one of the best and must purchases we made for our baby. I cannot believe how steardy and durable it is. Very easy to assemble and very easy to walk around in smooth or hard surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality stroller
reviews.reviewText: First time mom here. Heard great things about this stroller. I find it to be light weight. Easy to fold and unfold. Can use with multiple attachments - bassinet, infant carrier, toddler seat. Glides like a dream.I did have to purchase a separate attachment to use as a cup holder. Overall a good purchase for me!ConsIt is expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up!
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is amazing!! Set up took no time at all and changing between seat/bassinet attachments is so easy.Made very well, wheels glide so nicely and it’s pretty to look at with lots of storage space!
Llego intacta y completa!El color, la tela y la función de todos sus accesorios es perfecta! La calidad de los materiales me dan la seguridad de saber que esta carriola nos acompañará muchos años 🫶🏻

Yo la compré porque mi hermano la tiene y cumple totalmente mis expectativas.Cuando vi el precio (más bajo de lo normal) decidí comprarla y hasta después empecé a leer las reseñas que había del producto y me dio un poco de miedo porque había quienes decían que venía usada etc. en mi caso el paquete venía perfectamente sellado solo la caja mostraba golpes manejo propios de la paquetería que en ocasiones y cuando son paquetes grandes ya me ha tocado que llegan así, por lo mismo llego con un tallon que hizo la fricción de la carriola con la caja de cartón pero nada que afecte la estética y el funcionamiento. Y esto totalmente ajeno al proveedor.Si recomiendo la compra.
Excelente llego muy rápido y todo en orden y la calidad de la carriola y la marca es muy superior. Muy contento con la compra.
Llegó Perfecto, la caja de la marca original, todo nuevo y en perfecto estado estoy feliz con la compra
